alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 25 at 2:35PM EST until January 26 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. The heaviest snow can be expected along highways M-38 and M-26. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Ontonagon County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 11 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
